body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Perry Enterprises. My name is Gerald Perry. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Debra Thomas.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Debra. Can you please provide me with the last two digits of your phone number and the first three digits of your zip code for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the last two digits of my phone number are four one, and the first three digits of my zip code are zero zero eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Debra. Could you also provide me with the month and day of your birthday in numbers, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My birthday is on twelve fifteen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Debra, for providing the information. I will assist you with the data management issue related to the Car Dealership. Is there a specific reason you are feeling sad about this situation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've been facing challenges in maintaining accurate records, and it's causing me a lot of stress.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how frustrating that can be. Thank you for sharing your concerns, Debra. We will work together to find a solution. Your feedback is valuable. Thank you for your time today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Goodbye, Debra. Have a great day.
